name: Project: Boost
description:
My Project: Boost game that I made as a part of Gamedev.TV's awesome Unity 3D course on Udemy. This is my first 3D game, so it isn't perfect, but I would love to hear any feedback/suggestions that anybody has.

It's pretty bare-bones right now and definitely far from finished, but I figured I would try to get some feedback before proceeding.

The object of this game is to fly from the blue launch pad to the green landing pad without touching any of the obstacles!

CONTROLS:

Press and hold SPACE to thrust.

Press and A to rotate left.

Press and hold D to rotate right.
